author: vgeorgescu
msg: Finish the rest of issue #2705: nested copies from readable paths into
copied-from-unreadable dirs should now preserve history.
(add_subdir): Iterate over the directory entries in the source path, not the
target path, and add a comment explaining why. If an entry is marked as
deleted in the changed_paths hash, skip it. Remove ### comments.

author: giorgio_valoti
msg: * subversion/po/it.po:  - Fixed all fuzzy translations and translated

author: nori
msg: Improve locking error messages, as a follow-up to r23109.
Change the word "has" to "contains" in error messages.

author: glasser
msg: Split the Issue #2705 test into two: one which tests that the part we
fixed is fixed, and an XFail one which tests the part we haven't fixed
(copy_with_mod_from_unreadable_dir): Remove the copy of a readable file
copy_with_mod_from_unreadable_dir, but just testing the "copy of a readable
file into the copied directory" case.
